attributes.action: Call for a vote of no confidence In Boris Johnson and his current government
attributes.additional_details:
During the past 6 months our country has faced some of the most darkest and uncertain times in history.
our government has been going back on itself with its advice, performing U turns at every hurdle.
now is time for change!
 we need a new Leader and government to bring us out of this uncertainty, a true leader, who is clear with their advice in moving us forward so we can get back to Some kind of normality before it’s to late act now sign this petition for it to be considered in parliament
attributes.background: Strike a motion for a vote of no confidence in the current Prime minister Boris Johnson, along with members of his cabinet such as Matt Hancock And the chief medical officer Chris Whitty due to their incompetence and handling of this country during the pandemic
